description.message: Download links on a web page with popular downloaders such as FlashGet, FlashGet Mini, Thunder and Mini Thunder.
description.description: Description of the extension, which appears in the gallery and Chrome extension management UI.

tip_no_link.message: There are no links on this page
tip_no_link.description: Browser action tooltip text when there are no links to download.

tip_special.message: This is a special page. Unable to use Download Helper on this page.
tip_special.description: Browser action tooltip text when the current tab is a special page.

tip_no_downloader.message: No downloaders detected. To enable Download All feature, please install FlashGet or Thunder.
tip_no_downloader.description: Browser action tooltip text when no downloader is installed.

tip_mini_flashget.message: FlashGet Mini detected. To enable Download All feature, please install FlashGet or Thundet.
tip_mini_flashget.description: Browser action tooltip text when only FlashGet Mini is installed.

tip_mini_thunder.message: Mini Thunder detected. To enable Download All feature, please install FlashGet or Thunder.
tip_mini_thunder.description: Browser action tooltip text when only Mini Thunder is installed.

tip_mini_flashget_and_thunder.message: FlashGet Mini and Mini Thunder detected. To enable Download All feature, please install FlashGet or Thunder.
tip_mini_flashget_and_thunder.description: Browser action tooltip text when only FlashGet Mini and Mini Thunder are installed.

download_all_with_thunder_or_flashget.description: Browser action tooltip text when both FlashGet and Thunder are installed.

download_all_with_flashget.description: The 1st menu item in browser action popup.

download_all_with_thunder.description: The 2nd menu item in browser action popup.

menu_flashget.description: The 1st menu item in context menu.

menu_mini_flashget.description: The 2nd menu item in context menu.

menu_thunder.description: The 3rd menu item in context menu.

menu_mini_thunder.description: The 4th menu item in context menu.

menu_chrome.description: The 5th menu item in context menu.

menu_copy_link.description: The 6th menu item in context menu.

menu_disable.description: The 7th menu item in context menu.

option.description: The 8th menu item in context menu.

flashget.description: The 1st default downloader option, a popular download manager software.

mini_flashget.description: The 2nd default downloader option, the mini version of FlashGet.

thunder.description: The 3rd default downloader option, a popular download manager software in China.

mini_thunder.description: The 4th default downloader option, the mini version of Thunder.

disable.message: Disable right-click download menu and use default Chrome context menu

save_and_close.description: Save & Close button on the option page.
